name: Langfuse
description: Open source LLM engineering platform: LLM Observability, metrics, evals, prompt management, playground, datasets
info:
Great open source tracing, monitoring and evaluation framework for GenAI inference.
Does not require GPUs
template_rules: Langfuse is an evaluation and traceability tool for LLMs, but does not itself deploy any models. With the Langfuse template you can deploy a Langfuse server to monitor and evaluate your LLM models.
